channel.title: Dieing for an answer o.O
channel.description:
Is there a way to mute people who first log in and have a command to unmute them selves ? Because There was a server I went on and it was like type ::email (Your E-Mail) To talk and I was like how the hell did he do that o.O
Btw does it stop syi? o.O It should I guess. But it wont stop them from logging in :( But then its easier to ipban them o.O But then you could just use files! Who will answer these questions! :D

item.title: Dieing for an answer o.O
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“oldschoolscape, post:6, topic:262056”][quote author=Saphiroth link=topic=346103.msg2666972#msg2666972 date=1234621464]
Noo I have a mute command… Im saying is there a way to mute new players automatically instead of doing it your self and making a command to unmute them selves? So it stops spammers?
[/quote]

he basically wants it so a new player logs in and cannot talk untill he does ::email and types his email in.[/quote]
Ah, I get what he means now.

What source are you using?

Read full topic
